definition:
The [*vectorization*]{} of a $m\!\times\!n$ matrix $A = (a_{ij})$ the
matrix to a column vector $\mbox{vec}(A)$, which consists of all columns
of $A$ stacked in :
$$\mbox{vec}(A) \;:=\; \left(a_{11}\;\;a_{21}\;\ldots\;a_{m1}\;\;\;a_{12}\;\;a_{22}\;\ldots\;a_{m2}\;\;
\ldots\;\ldots\;\;a_{1n}\;\;a_{2n}\;\ldots\;a_{mn}\right)^\intercal$$
The mapping vec from the vector space formed by the $m\!\times\!n$
matrices to the vector space of the column vectors of the $mn$ is
apparently a linear transformation.
